name: fluent-bundle
description: Test Fluent and React bundle for Web Chat
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && (npm audit fix || exit 0)
scripts.bump:dev: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $P | (.localPeerDependencies // []) as $L | (.devDependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | contains([$K]) | not)) | map(.key + "@" + ($P[.key] // ["latest"])[0]) | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.bump:prod: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $P | (.localPeerDependencies // []) as $L | (.dependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | contains([$K]) | not)) | map(.key + "@" + ($P[.key] // ["latest"])[0]) | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install --save-exact $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.postversion: cat package.json | jq '.version as $V | . + (.dependencies = (.dependencies + ((.localPeerDependencies // []) | map({(.): $V }) | add)) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries) + (.devDependencies = (.devDependencies + ((.localPeerDevDependencies // []) | map({(.): $V }) | add)) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries)' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:eslint -- src && npm run precommit:typecheck
scripts.preversion: cat package.json | jq '(((.localPeerDependencies // []) | map(["dependencies", .])) + ((.localPeerDevDependencies // []) | map(["devDependencies", .]))) as $localPeerPaths | delpaths($localPeerPaths)' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
